content: What legendary British musician, known for his flamboyant style and hits like "Rocket Man" and "Tiny Dancer," was born Reginald Kenneth Dwight?

That would be Elton John, one of the best-selling music artists in the world. His real name is indeed Reginald Kenneth Dwight. He's renowned not only for his music but also for his distinctive voice and extravagant stage outfits. His songs have become anthems for various communities and his philanthropic work is also highly acclaimed.
